titles: The lovers ioy and griefe: or A young mans relation in a pitifull fashion, being from his loue hindred by locks, bolts, and kindred. To the tune of, Yongmen and maids.
author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?
publisher: For Tho: Lambert and are to be sold at the signe of the Hors-shoo in Smithfield.,
notes: Verse: "Among the vine, all nymphes diuine ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
